summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3833 for the improvement of Renton Avenue, from 37th Avenue South to a point opposite the north line of Tract 34, Frye's Addition to Columbia; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47066, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
